greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of proper divisors d of n such that Stern polynomial B(d,x) is irreducible.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..22001
example: For n=50, with proper divisors [1, 2, 5, 10, 25], 2, 5, and 25 are larger than one and included in A186891, thus a(50) = 3.
xref: Differs from A087624 for the first time at n=50.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 10 2017
